jobDescription: Advocating an integrated design-build model, Kirlin Design Build (KDB) combines in-house engineering and BIM coordination capabilities with self-performed construction, prefabrication, and commissioning to successfully provide customers a single-source solution. KDB's single-source, or turn-key, approach to design-build delivery is ideally suited for difficult and complex projects because the majority of services related to the project's mechanical scope of are performed in-house. By providing most of the services in-house, we can better control costs, coordination, schedule, and commissioning, while being more responsive to ownership concerns and requirements during the design and construction processes, the owner ultimately receives a better end result.  KDB is looking for talented individuals who enjoy challenges to join the team. We are currently seeking for a Sr. HVAC Design Engineer. Senior HVAC Design Engineer at Kirlin Design Build is generally assigned to a project after award and has the primary responsibility of ensuring project design success. This person oversees and actively participates in calculations and design document production; including managing the activities of other engineers and staff, while working collaboratively with the outside team members. At times a Senior HVAC Design Engineer will be responsible for multiple projects, depending upon project size and schedule. A Senior HVAC Design Engineer is expected to be a strong mentor to KDB design engineers and interns within the office.  The Lead HVAC Design Engineer is responsible for Complex Design for HVAC,Laboratory, and some Clean Room Design.  Heavy focus in Design Build with Healthcare, Hospital experience and some Laboratory experience  (Government Labs or Military Healthcare experience a Plus).
